description: This file defines configuration structures, validation rules, and a thread-safe ConfigManager for managing application configuration, including change notifications and validation, with extensive testing for concurrency, validation, and performance.

classes.name: PerformanceMetrics
classes.description: Tracks performance metrics such as latencies, memory, and CPU usage during stress tests.

methods.description: Records the latency of an operation.

methods.name: record_cpu

methods.name: calculate_percentile
methods.description: Calculates the latency at a given percentile.
